thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 7 of 62
thread.title: Alison M. Carville
thread.title_full: Templatemonster reviewed by Alison M. Carville

author: Alison M. Carville
title: Alison M. Carville
text:
I am learning as I go with a template I purchased from this site. The template itself has more than I need so I needed to "unpublish" some pages. Some sections, or "modules," were hard for me to locate so I went on to Chat Support.
She was very understanding of my confusion/frustration with my learning where things were in the administrator's dashboard. She offered screen shots when she found what I had questions about, which I am quite impressed by.
I would definitely recommend her support and TemplateMonster to anyone needing to build their own website.
